about_the_game:
The world ended, but that’s in the past. You have a mech and a dream to rebuild society.

As part of the Reseeding programing, you and three experts are sent to a part of the broken world armed with the swiss-army tool of construction and farming – a Mech! The world finally knows peace, so you can explore and uncover the vast number of secrets and stories without need for combat. Use your mech to scavenge the endless ruins for useful material and help your settlement take root into a new town. Farm and manufacture at scale! Be forewarned, your mech’s power core only has three years left of life so you will have to say goodbye one day and start a new life with another mech.

You don’t have much. But you have your best friend. Your only friend. Your mech.

Features:
  • Build a thriving farm and town. Grow crops and process them into food, fuel, or many other useful goods. Your town needs them to grow and develop.
  • Mechs to plowshares. There is no fighting. There is no combat. You use your mechanized warmachine for building and reclaiming a broken world.
  • Enjoy multiple playthroughs – a roguelike mechlike. You will meet different NPCs, find different equipment, and have different starting mechs/locations to choose from to make each journey unique.
  • Become the foundation of a new community. You and your mech make it possible to rebuild society. You will attract and befriend unique and quirky NPCs with their own stories to discover and with their own unique benefits to help you and the town grow. Put yourself in a living story written by an award-winning science fiction writer Mur Lafferty.
  • Customize your mech. Find and build components to upgrade your mech with equipment like a new cannon that better waters crops, jump jets that let you access new areas, or wood paneling to make your mech more cozy!
  • Automate your farms. With the circuitry scavenged in the ruins, construct drones to harvest crops or search for useful materials.
  • Build mega projects. Focus your run to construct a mega project (like a hydroelectric dam or rail line) that will permanently affect future playthroughs and bring your world one-step closer to society.

short_description: The world ended, but that’s in the past. You have a mech and a dream to rebuild society. Transform your mech from war machine to tool for farming, scavenging, and building. Develop friendships with new townsfolk and explore ruins of the past. Do it all alongside your best friend: your mech.
